alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 8:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nassau Village-Ratliff, or near Callahan, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
